item.title: My New Static Blog
item.description: Rewriting my blog again. This time to be static and easily hosted on Github Pages.

item.title: Newton's Cradle Sim in a Browser
item.description: Using Web Assembly to run a Newton's Cradle simulation in a browser with Rust and Bevy.
